#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a,b,c,x;
	double p;
	long long m,n;
	while(1)
	{
		scanf("%de%d",&a,&b);
		if(a==0)
		break;
		p=pow(10.0,(double)b);
		x=(int)floor(log10(a*p)/log10(2.0));
		m=(long long)pow(2.0,(double)x);
		n=(long long)(2*(a*p-m)+1);
		cout<<n<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
